inn1.comm: on a length around the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
slip and short midwicket watch as Kohli takes a half-step forward to push a length delivery down the track
leans across to dab a full and angling delivery to Murali at third man
Sangakkara is standing up to the stumps and watches as Gambhir turns a length delivery to point region
full and straightening on that middle stump line, Kohli gets his bat across the front pad - not pressed too far across - and to square leg
slightly short of the driveable length, again on that middle stump line, worked to short midwicket
gets forward to square drive a full length delivery through cover point.  The electric Dilshan chases it and pulls it back from the ropes with a sliding diving effort.
no major movement so far. On a length and just outside off stump, defended to the off side
And finally some movement. In swing. It nips back in from outside off stump, darts in to beat the forward prod and runs off the pad to the leg side
short and width outside off stump, cut straight to point.
fuller and straightening on the middle stump line, Gambhir crouches, gets his bat in line to defend to the leg side.

walks down the track - Sangakkara is standing back for Kulasekara - misses to connect with the dab to the off side and Sanga fails to collect cleanly. The ball rolls dangerously close to the helmet placed behind the 'keeper. (5 penalty runs had it hit)
cuts in from outside off, edges the defensive stroke to his pad and the ball rolls to the off side. The 'keeper is standing up to the stumps.
fuller but drifting down leg, flicked to Murali at long leg.
slanting away from Kohli who gets forward, bat and pad close together, to push the ball to covers
lands on a length on the middle stump line, moves towards off and middle, on driven to mid-on
fuller, around the off and middle line, Kohli drives pleasingly to covers.
hello?! A wristy across-the-line chip-slog. It was full and just outside off, he crouched forward, bottom hand working over time and he chipped it across in the air  towards wide midwicket region.
shaping in with the angle, on the off stump line, dabbed to short midwicket.
the second ball that swung today. Again the inswing and Kohli flicks the full delivery past square leg

This one shapes away and induces the edge from a hesitant froward prod but there is no slip and and the ball rushes through to the cordon. Not that it would have carried to the man had he been there ...
from back of length, shaping in, tucked to right of square leg where Mendis makes a diving stop
fuller, around the off stump, shapes to off drive, the bat-face shuts a touch and the ball rolls past the bowler and the mid-on fielder comes across to make the stop
homing in on the off stump, leans across to defend to covers
leans forward, opens the bat face to guide a length delivery to third man for a single
on a length, angling across, guided to backward point

Almost caught at mid-off. Again that across-the-line scoop-whip gets him in trouble. It landed around the off stump, full and angling away, Kohli tries to whip it across and gets a leading edge in the air and to the left of Jayasuriya.
swings in from outside off, on driven to mid-on.
off cutter outside off, dabbed past backward point for a single
lands outside off, on a length, shapes away, left alone and Sangakkara, up the stumps, gathers.
lands on the off stump line, straightens, squeezed to backward point
coming in from outside off stump, from a length and Kohli leans across to play a compact defensive stroke.
coming in to the middle and leg line, Kohli wrists it across to long leg.
quick single. He pushed to right of Murali at mid-off and set off with the stroke. The throw came in, missed but GAmbhir would have been home even if it had hit.
beaten by a lovely delivery. It landed on a length and cut away late past the forward prod. To his credit, Kohli pushed inside the line and didn't follow the ball.
leans across to defend a ength delivery to covers
walks down the track - Sangakkara was standing up- to push a short-of-length delivery to left of midwicket for a single.
full pitched outside off, inviting the drive and the teenager responds to the challenge- leans forward to square drive it through cover gap
around the off stump, on a length this time and Kohli gets across to defend to point
And Kohli has taken up the challenge and has beaten the offside trap. It was the slower off cutter, Kohli picked it, waited to thrash it to the left of short cover point. Thrilling stuff.
leans forward to defend to the off side

closer to the off stump, Kohli had got rather close to the line of the ball, waited to chop it down to third man for a single. Last ball single to retain the strike. It's called Gaaji in Chennai lingo.
full, shaping in towards the off stump, Kohli is a touch late in getting forward and pushes the ball down the track
around the off stump, full, just a tiny step forward and he pushes it to covers. Gary Kirsten is having a close look at Kohli's batting
just a touch outside off and Kohli square drives on the up to point
cuts in - that is his natural angle - tucked to short midwicket
another nip backer, fuller this time and clipped to deep square leg region
short and outside off stump, Gambhir stayed adjacent to the line to slice the ball in the air and to left of wide third man
full in length, around the off stump line, leans forward to defend to the off side. The wait for 400th wicket continues for Vaasy
short cover point and short extra cover watch as Kohli dabs a length delivery angling across him to third man.
walks across to the off stump line and chops a length delivery to left of gully where Mahela makes a diving stop
Super stop from Dilshan at backward point. It was cut hard to the ground and it bounced to the left of him and he took off in the air to bring the ball back down safely.
predetermined swipe across the line. He walked across to the off side and swung a slower delivery to midwicket boundary.
again that shuffle - since Sangakkara is standing up, Gambhir is not walking down the track but more towards the off side - and guides a short of length delivery to third man
stretches across to drive to mid-off
leans forward to punch to covers
Gambhir is taking risks; at least what is perceived as risk generally. Couple of steps down the track and he heaves the length delivery high over mid-off.
And he is gone now. He carved the short-of-length delivery angled well across him straight to backward point.
angled across Yuvraj who thinks about playing a stroke before changing his mind.
beaten outside off. Kohli followed the length delivery slanted across him and the ball rushed past the outside edge.
Almost caught by Vaasy. Kohli has this tendency to drive on the up and on this slow track it's fraught with risk. He was early into the punch-drive and the ball went over the leaping Vaas.
beaten. It landed on a length outside off and came in. Yuvraj pushed the bat so much inside the line that he was beaten. It did come in all right but not as much as Yuvraj thought.
on the off stump line, tries to work it to the on side but ends up dabbing it back down the track
fuller, probing line around the off stump continues, Yuvraj is caught at the crease, late in reacting but jabs it to the off side
cuts in from a length, to the middle stump line, turned to the on side

cutting in towards the middle, Kohli loves to whip those deliveries to the on side. This one rolls down to deep square leg . The bottom hand takes over and he rolls the wrists over in a exaggerated fashion
lovely straight drive with the full face of the bat but Kulasekara makes a diving stop to his right.
Kohli reverts to his whip to the on side. Another couple of runs, this time to deep midwicket region.
on a length, around the off stump, punched on the up to mid-off
Another attempt to drive on the up and he mistimes it on this slow track to the off side. He seems rather upset with himself.

Vaasy gets his wicket no 400. He is lifted in the air by Kapugedera even as the rest of the team converge. The off cutter on the  slow wicket has consumed Yuvraj. He is early into his whip across the line and the ball stopped on him, took the edge and went straight to short midwicket. Vaas saw the ball was taken, raised his arms, lifted his head up to the skies and shut his eyes. Blink. And his team-mates were there to congratulate him.
cutting in from outside off, defended to the off side
leans forward to defend another length delivery
presses back to push a short-of-length delivery down the track
slower, off cutter, Raina waits before defending to covers
121.4 kmph delivery outside off stump, guided to point region
shout for lbw but it was sliding down leg side. It was full and swung back in from outside off, Kohli tried to work it through the on side, missed and was struck on the pad.
around the off stump line, pushed to the off side

We know he loves those on-the-up drives, has perished earlier in the series attempting that but he has pulled it off here in a grand fashion. He leaned forward, the bat came down nice and firm and he met the ball on the up and creamed it through wide mid-off. Never easy and not always without risk on a slow track. But when it comes off it looks rather spectacular.
turns a length delivery past square leg, wants the second but Raina asks him to get back. Can't keep continuing with the Gaaji and chance peretha young man!
beaten outside off stump. Leaden-footed, the upper body just lunged across to jab at a length delivery leaving him and no wood on leather
gets his feet moving this time and plays a delectable cover drive
the off cutter from short of length, Kohli whips it from outside off to midwicket
whipped just over short midwicket. Another short of length cutter that came in from outside leg stump towards middle and off and Virat Kohli chipped it across the line and just over the fielder
beaten this time. He tries to follow the off cutter - fuller in length this time - and is beaten on the attempted dab to third man.
slower, fuller, around the off stump, driven to mid-off
even slower, around 117 kmph delivery, just outside off stump, steered to point
short and angling away, Raina steers it
full, angling in, Kohli whips it away towards midwicket, where the sweeper will cut the boundary off
length ball, on the stumps, defended to mid-on
short, asking to be punished, and Kohli does that. Hit towards midwicket, but wide of the fielder
wide, too wide, Kohli goes for the drive, plays it away from the body, to extra-cover in the circle. Kohli is not pleased with that shot
length ball on the stumps, worked away towards squareleg, and these two young men will come back for an easy couple. Kohli one short of a half-century now
short, on off stumps, Raina drills it straight down the ground, but mid-off is alert
slightly slower, Raina adjusts well, plays it back to Vaas who gets just a hand, and the batsmen run through off the deflection. That's alert running
that's Kohli's half-century, steered away to thirdman. That's Kohli's first 50 in international cricket
length ball, on the stumps, worked away into the leg side
this was short, on and outside off stump, and Kohli whips it between midwicket and mid-on. He had committed on to the front foot, but pulled a good shot
off cutter around off, defended to the off side

tries to force a short of length delivery through the on side - rather ambitious considering this is the first ball of the bowler and more importantly, he is still new to the crease - and mistimes it to wide midwicket
solitary slip in place watches as Kohli shoulders arms to a length delivery slanted across him. Kohli wants to gauge the pace of the new bowler before he decides to play his shots

But he is gone now! Inside edge and on to the stumps, Kohli is very disappointed. It bounced from short of length, more pace than the other two bowlers so far, and Kohli tried to push it to cover point with an angled bat, well away from the body, but the ball collided with the inside edge and crashed on to the off stump. Enter Dhoni.
in the zone outside off stump, around 137 kmph delivery, left alone
leans forward to defend to the off side
off break from the middle stump line, defended to the off side
another off break from the leg and middle line and Raina presses forward to defend
lands outside the leg stump, turned behind square leg
loopy dellivery, bit more air, full and on the middle and leg, turned past the diving Dilshan at midwicket for a single
Raina decides to attack Mendis. He charged down the track to loft the off break three bounces to the long-off boundary
fuller, flatter, outside off, pushed to covers
short of length, angled across Dhoni who goes back and across to cut it hard to wide third man
cutting in a touch, from just outside the off stump, Raina's feet are glued to each other, going nowhere but he adjusts by crouching and jabs the ball of the inside edge to the on side
again the hesitant shuffle and works the length delivery to short midwicket. He practises getting his feet going forward and driving in the V
shuffles across to lean back to guide a back-of-length delivery outside off to deep backward point region
on a length outside off, Raina stays back to steal a single with a push to cover point
short of length outside off stump, punched to deep cover
slid in from the leg stump line, Dhoni pushed down middle and leg and was hit on the pad. It was flicked by that middle finger
lunges across to defend a delivery on middle and off
slightly short and cut to backward point
leg break on the middle stump line, Dhoni goes back and gets  his bat down in a hurry in front of the back pad to push the ball to the off side
on the off and middle line, Dhoni stays adjacent to the line, taking care not to press his front leg across and jabs it to the off side
lands on the middle and off, moves towards off, defended to covers. Maiden over
stays back to punch a length delivery through covers for a single
fullish, just outside off stump, bottom-hand powered drive to deep cover fetches him a single
high harmless bouncer and Raina ducks
slower one, around 121 kmph, full and on the off stump line, Raina is made to wait and he defends to the off side
around 138 kmph full length delivery outside off stump, cover driven to sweeper for a single
short of length, around 141.6 kmph delivery, on the middle and leg, tapped close on the leg side. Dhoni set for the over-gaaji but Raina sent him back.
floated outside off stump, full and Raina stretched across to whip a on drive to the left of mid-on.
flighted off break, tapped to left of mid-on for a single
on the middle, cutting away a touch, Dhoni stays on the leg stump line, adjacent to the line and drives to mid-off
full and on the middle, pushed through cover point for a single. He leaned forward, not across, opened the bat face and pushed the ball into the gap
quicker, on the middle stump line, skids on, defended bat and pad close together to the off side
goes back to turn a short of length delivery on the leg stump line past square leg for couple of runs
short of length around the off stump, Dhoni doesn't quite move towards the line and hence mistimes the punch drive to extra cover
wider, fuller and Dhoni lets it go. Doctrove extends his arms to signal wide
full in length, wrists his punchy drive to short cover. He stayed back and twirled his bat, the bottom-hand powering the arc of the bat
tiny step forward and he drives the full pitched delivery to mid-off
he flayed that. He pressed back to force the short delivery in the air but quickly past the short-cover fielder who had no time to react.
fuller and in the zone outside off stump, left alone
even fuller, on the middle, a touch late in reacting but he gets his bat down to push it to wide mid-on region for a single
on the middle stump line, straightening from short of length, flat batted to long on
slower, off break around the off stump line, Raina stays back to steer it to cover point for a single
on the middle stump line, full, pushed back to Mendis
skips down the track, Mendis shortens the length and Dhoni adjusts to open the bat face and push it through cover point
Raina comes down the track to push a off break to short cover
leg break around the off stump line, Raina stays back, the ball stops on him a touch and the intended punch drive takes the ball in the air but it flies past Dhoni for a single
quick and flat off break from round the stumps, around the off stump, forced through cover point
slower, flighted outside off stump, from over the wickets, steered to deep backward point region
shorter, turning in from outside off stump and that length allows Dhoni to rock back and force it past the short cover fielder and to the boundary. Too short.
short of length, turning in from outside off, Dhoni cleverly shuffles to the off stump, gets outside the line and works with the turn past square leg

beaten on the drive. Finally he pings the full length, suckes Raina forward into a off drive before dipping quickly and turning past the bat. Sanga takes off the bails but the back foot was inside the crease
back to short of length, forced away to covers for a single
presses his front leg across to clip the ball on the middle to backward square leg for a single. Slightly risky option as a skidder might hit his pad first.
Dhoni continues with his simple approach: Stay on the leg stump line, stay adjacent to the line and opens the bat face to steer the ball on the middle and leg to cover point
on the middle and leg, defended to the on side
flighted delivery on the middle and leg, full, driven to long-on
couple of steps down the track towards the off and middle line and he works the delivery from middle to the right of midwicket for a quick single.
full and on the leg and middle line, again driven to long-on for a single
stays back to steer the off break to backward point
again on the back foot and pushes through covers, Dilshan gets a hand on the ball  with a diving attempt
iirc first full length flighted delivery to Dhoni who edges the off drive down the track
well-flighted off break, turning in from outside off and Dhoni gets across to defend to the off side
leans forward to drive down to long-on
shorter in length, flatter and outside off, Raina goes back to bring up the fifty of the partnership with a cut to sweeper cover region
skips down the track, moving towards the off stump in the process and eased a full pitch delivery past mid-off for the boundary.
full in length, around the off stump, Dhoni is caught at the crease - neither forward nor back - tries to whip a square drive and edges it to third man
slower, outside off stump, steered to deep point region
shuffles outside leg and Thushara bangs in a bouncer and Raina sways away from the line
another bouncer, this time Raina moves towards middle stump line to sway away from the leg stump bouncer
another short-pitched delivery but this time going down the leg side.
fuller, on the leg and middle line, flicked to fine leg for a single
flighted off break from round the stumps, full and Raina plays a good-looking off drive to right of long-off. Hit all along the ground.
lands outside leg stump, turns in, nudged of the pad to short fine leg region
flighted delivery, full and outside off stump, driven to long-off for a single
flatter, outside off, Raina goes back to push it to covers
on the middle and leg line, goes for the sweep and it rolls of the pad to fine leg. Signalled as runs, perhaps he got a bottom edge. Murali doesn't look too convinced.
down the track and drives but straight to covers
slower one, on the middle and leg, turning towards middle, Dhoni adjusts to push it to the off side
a touch short in length, slanting away from Dhoni who punches it to Mahela at point
Thushara saw Dhoni come down the track and banged in a short one and Dhoni adjusted to pull it to deep square leg region
leans forward to drive to mid-off
Gorgeous extra-cover drive from Raina. He leaned into his shot and drove the full-pitched delivery inside-out
moved outside leg stump, Thushara slipped in a slower one but dragged it well outside the off stump. Dhoni has a chat with Raina
on the off stump line, from a length, opened his bat face to run it fine to right of third man
on a length, on off, Dhoni waltzes down the track and nudges it square on the leg side
doosra on a length, Raina used his feet and pats it back to the bowler
shorter, and some width on offer, Raina pushes it on the off
drives it down the past the bowler for a single
Fifty for Raina! and what a shot to bring it up with. He comes down the track and lofts him over extra cover for four
ends the over with a single, pushing a doosra to sweeper cover
produces the edge straight away but it goes through the vacant slip region. It was full, turning in a touch, Raina stayed back and tried to drive through the line and got a thick edge
skips down the track and towards off stump, taps it to the on side, looking for a single but it's not there
floated outside off, driven to long-off
slow, turning in from just outside off stump, Raina decides to stay back to the full length delivery, shaping to pull before pushing it through to long-on
short of length delivery and forced of the back foot to left of covers
retains the strike by moving down the track and to the off stump, getting outside the line before dabbing it to square leg
doosra around the off stump line, steered to cover point for a single
short of length, cut to sweeper cover for a single
leans forward to defend the off break to the off side
opens the bat face to ping the cover point gap for a single
rips a quickish off break from over the wicket, it pitched outside leg stump, hurried in to hit the back pad right in front
comes down the track, lunges forward to adjust to the dipping delivery and pushes it to long-off
floated full outside off stump, Raina, as his wont, stays back, tries to late cut through vacant slip region but doesn't connect
goes for the reverse sweep and edges it to short third man region.
couple of steps down the track and he paddle sweeps it very fine to the fine-leg region for couple more runs
flatter but well short of length and forced hard with that flat-batted heave of his to right of deep cover where Dilshan makes a diving stop
lunges forward to drive to long-off for a single
stays back to punch a full-length delivery turning in to long-on for a single. 100 of the partnership is up.
tries to come down the track, Murali dragged back the length and pitched it outside off, Raina stopped his forward movement, lunged across to reach the ball and pushed it through covers
flighted full, turns in from outside off stump, defended to the off side
beaten outside off. It landed outside off, turned in slightly, not as much as Dhoni thought
stretches well forward to drive to covers
flighted full, on the middle, worked with the turn past square leg
There comes the big hit. Almost expected. He cleared the front foot and slog-swept Murali over deep midwicket boundary. The runs are flowing here for the Indians. What can Mahela do?
steered to short third man region
goes back to pull it to short midwicket
goes for the reverse sweep, again mistimes it through cover point

Dhoni agrees with the tactic and unfurls a reverse paddle to backward point for a single. While Raina was trying to beat the hell out of the leather with his reverse sweep, Dhoni just tapped it for a single
on the back foot, forced to long-off for a single
floated on the stumps, jabbed away to the on side and Jayasuriya mis fields

couple of steps down the track and paddle sweeps to short fine leg region and runs really hard to come back for the second run. A direct hit at the non-striker's end but Raina is home. And that's his fifty.
leans across to push to covers
There is that Paddle sweep again. He takes a couple of steps down the track before paddling it very fine.
He attempts that shot again but misses to connect and it rolls of the pad to the off side
stays at his original position to guide the leg cutter to backward point
quicker, skids on but its outside leg stump and it runs of the pad to fine leg region
on the middle and leg, jabbed to the on side
lunges forward to scoop a flighted delivery past Jayasuriya and to long-off
flatter, full and Dhoni reverse sweeps it past backward point. Again no violence but just placing.
big turn there! Hmm... It spun sharply past a surprised Dhoni who later smiles. Must be thinking its a good sign for Harbhajan
turned through the on side for a single
leans forward to squeeze a skidder of the inner edge to square leg
short in length, skidding away from Raina who punches it of the back foot to deep cover
that skip down the track and Mendis flicks the ball away and Dhoni adjusts to defend to covers

again that move down the track from Dhoni and Mendis adjusts by shortening the length and Dhoni lunges across to jab to cover point. The throw misses the non-striker's end and that allows Dhoni to come back for the second
driven to long-off for a single. Dhoni is struggling out there, breathing heavily, hands on his knees. Pretty humid conditions.
goes for the slog sweep but fails to connect and the ball rolls of the pad.
starts off with a slower one but on the legs, flicked to deep square leg
another slower one, around 112 kmph delivery, full and on the middle stump line, pushed to covers
low full toss outside off, stabbed through cover point
down the leg side, Raina tries to help it along on its way, doesn't connect and Sangakkara gathers
short in length, around 131 kmph delivery on the off stump line, guided to backward point

What a stunning shot. He threatened to jump out before hopping back, maintained his balance and poise some how in all this movement and played a delightful punch on the up and one bounce to wide long-off boundary.
high bouncer down the leg side

Holes out to long-off this time, though. He threatened to move outside leg, got in line and went down on his knee to time the lofted shot well but straight to the man. 76 very good runs from Suresh Raina. He kicked the ground as he walked off
turning in to the pads, glanced very fine
leans forward to turn the off break to square leg
doosra outside off stump, opened the bat face to steer to short third man
another doosra, short in length, punched back to Murali and Kohli scampers back to the crease
shout for lbw but turned down. It was the spinning off break and Rohit was caught on the back foot. It looked like it would have just missed the leg stump
rips another quicker off break, Rohit presses back to defend
couple of steps down the track, yorks himself, has a stabd but the ball goes under the bat and past the off stump
full pitched delivery, driven hard to wide long-off
full and outside off, edges the square drive to third man region

Jayasuriya takes a very good catch at covers to end the captain's knock. It was full and well outside off, Dhoni crouched on a bent knee, reached out to drive and Jayasuriya timed his lunge to his left well and pouched it safely. Two new batsmen at the crease
full in length, on the off stump line, eased through extra cover for a single
edged but fell just short of the lunging Sangakkara. Rohit went for the square cut but got a thin bottom edge
turning in from around the off stump, strikes the pad and rolls to leg side
quick off break outside off stump, Badrinath leans across to take it on the pad, trying to defend
stretches across, opens the bat face and guides to backward point region
loud shout for lbw. It spun in sharply from outside off stump, Rohit is surprised by the extent of the spin and the pace of it and jabbed it to his pad
again doesn't look too convincing but stabs the off break to the on side
leans forward to wrist the off break through midwicket and turns for the second run but is sent back in time.
lands on the off stump, cuts away, steered to backward point. No chance for a single
slightly short of length and Badrinath went back to cut it hard to deep point
lands outside off, turns away but short in length and that allows Rohit to stand tall and punch it down to long-off
fuller, straighter on the middle, driven back to Mendis
slower, driven to long-on for a single
loopy delivery on the middle and leg, eased to wide long-on for couple for runs.
steered to backward point for a single
driven to long-on for a single
flighted off break outside off stump, Badrinath leaned across, tried to wrist it to the on side for a single but was a touch early into his shot and ended up sending a dolly to short midwicket.
doosra outside off stump, pushed through cover point for the single
turns in to beat the prod across the line and is struck on the pad
sharp turn there. AGain, Rohit is in trouble, hanging on the back foot and edges to square leg. Murali is teasing and taunting Rohit.
More trouble for Rohit. Appeal for stumping. Turned down. That carrom ball. Rohit was sucked into the forward drive and was squared up as the ball left him late
decides to break free with a pre-determined shot. He tried to loft it over covers, it went to deep backward region
skids on towards off and middle, pushed to the off side
comes down the track, goes for the heave across the line but doesn't connect well and will pick up a single to deep midwicket
beaten comprehensively. It landed on the off and middle, cut away past the bemused Harbhajan
fuller, outside off stump, driven to covers
another big off break, Rohit can't put bat to ball and it rolls of the pad
couple of steps down the track, takes it on the full and drives  to long-on
Harbhajan goes for his favourite slog sweep, gets the top edge, the ball goes high but falls well short of Dilshan who came running in from deep midwicket
full around off, driven inside-out to left of long-off for couple of runs

Harbhajan is run out. Rohit came down the track to whip a flighted off break to deep square leg region. Couple of fielders screamed, "Bowler's end .. .bowler's end" and that's exactly where the throw went. Murali collected it and flicked it on to the stumps.
outside leg stump line, swept fine for two runs. Murali has completed his quota of ten overs
lunges forward to keep the ball out
beaten all hands up by the carrom ball that spun away. Kumar went for his drive and was squared up
hesitant lunge forward and jabs the full delivery to covers
gets off the strike of the fourth ball with a push to the on side
Mendis tricks him with change of pace and length. Rohit went for the slog-sweep but it was slower and short in length and Rohit edged it high to midwicket.
another lunge forward and he manages to drive to long-off for a single
The struggling Praveen Kumar is cleaned up finally. Full, straight, on the off stump, Praveen couldn't get his bat down in time and the off stump has been pegged back
goes for the yorker, ends up as low full toss around off stump, squeezed past point
another really full delivery, just short of the blockhole, dug out back to the bowler
Thushara gets a five-for. Zaheer backed away to the leg side and drove straight to covers.

inn2.comm: full and swinging in to the middle stump line, squeezed to square leg

super delivery, almost caught at backward point. It cut away late from Jayasuriya who withdraws his bat at the last minute, is late in doing so, and gets the edge and the ball flies between gully and backward point
on the middle stump line, dabbed to the on side
fuller, on the off stump line, gets forward to push it down the track
fuller, on the leg and middle line, swung to the leg side and Badrinath, standing to right of square leg, makes a diving stop
drags it well outside off stump and Doctrove signals wide.
lands on a length, just outside leg, moves towards leg, worked to midwicket
Beaten outside off stump. Searing full pitched delivery drifting in with the angle, drew Jayasuriya forward before leaving him late. Jaye was looking to push it to mid-on and was caught on the walk.
going down leg side and Dhoni collects
cutting in from outside off stump, Jayasuriya is late on the defensive stroke and squeezes it off the inner edge through square leg
a touch short in length outside off and Jayasuriya goes for the cut shot but bottom edges it to the off side
lands on the middle and drifts down leg side for another wide. There is some movement on offer under the lights.
Two slips watch as Jayasuriya tucks a short-of-length delivery coming into him to backward square leg region
136.6 kmph length delivery in the channel outside off stump, Warnapura withdraws his bat from the line and allows the ball pass him
In that zone again, around 136 kmph, left alone
width plus length offered outside off stump and Jayasuriya square cuts it past point
fuller, teasing line - just outside off and swinging away, left alone
lands just outside leg stump on a length, moves towards off and Jayasuriya stays side on to defend to  the off side.
even fuller, again moving from leg to middle and off, Jayasuriya retains his balance to defend down the track with the full face of the bat. Well bowled and very well played.
reverts to short and wide and is crashed to cover boundary.
on the off stump line, moving away, pushed to the off side
coming in from outside off, from a length, pushed to mid-off
136.4 kmph delivery outside off stump, a touch back of length and Warnapura tries to cut it but is too close to the ball and is beaten
short of length, well outside the off stump, left alone
cutting in from outside off stump, worked to midwicket. Jayasuriya goes across to have another chat with the youngster.
fuller in length, around off and middle, driven to mid-on where Munaf is stationed
140.0 kph delivery, full in length, landing outside off and shaping in a touch, left alone
back of length, swinging away from Jayasuriya who moves towards the line, opens the bat face and slices it over backward point
fuller, closer to the off stump, makes no difference to Jayasuriya who slices it over covers this time.
113.9 kmph slower one, on the middle and off line, defended down the track
128.3 kmph delivery around the off stump, guided to backward point for a quick single
on the legs, fullish, tries to whip across the line and runs of the pad to Dhoni
beaten by the away swinger. Warnapura, yet to get off the mark, went forward for the drive but ...  Again, the bottom-hand comes of the handle. He did that repeatedly during the Test series.
cutting in from outside off stump, Jayasuriya is late in getting the bat down in line but manages to get the inside edge to fine leg
beaten by the delivery that left him late. The previous cut in, this one seamed away with bounce. Zaheer is on top of his game here.
beaten again. What a over. Around 139 kmph delivery, full and outside off stump, Jayasuriay went forward to defend but the ball shaped away late.
fuller, on the middle and leg, turns to fine leg for a single
outside-off length delivery and Warnapura lets it go by.
still scoreless. He leans forward to push a length delivery down the track.
128.1kmph full length teasing delivery that straightened on the off stump, Jayasuriya got his bat straighter in a hurry and edged it through square leg
130,8 kmph delivery bouncing from short of length, again the bottom-hand comes off the handle as he jabs the ball to the off side

He has been given out lbw. It landed on short of  length around middle and off, cut in a touch to hit him high on the front thigh. It looked like it was going over the stumps. Virtual eye suggests the ball would have gone over the middle stump
gets in line of a length delivery to defend to the off side
goes back to steer a back-of-length delivery around off to Zaheer at third man
another shout for lbw as the ball straightens on the off stump line to strike high on the front pad. Jayasuriya was looking to defend but the ball held its line to beat his intent.
Good bowling continues. This one tailed away late past the forward prod and Zaheer appeals for a caught-behind decision after the first slipper initiated the query followed by Dhoni.
leans forward to defend to the off side
cutting in from a full length, Sangakkara is caught at the crease, pushes at it and edges it to square leg.
short of length outside off stump, coming in and Sangkkara pulls his bat inside the line , away from the ball
in the zone outside off stump, Sangakkara covers his off stump and lets the ball go past him
Munaf is getting the ball to hold the line and that is troubling the batsmen. This one straightens on the off stump and Jayasuriya is carefully behind the line and defends to the off side
again shaping in a touch around the off stump, Jayasuriya pushes it to covers.
gets this one to shape away and Jayasuriya shoulders arms
133.9 kmph length delivery around the off stump, pushed to point region. Munaf is bowling well, releasing from close to the stumps.
134.6 kmph and again that probing delivery - straightening around off stump from a length, and Jayasuriya defends to the on side
135 kmph short in length and it bounces towards the rib cage, tucked to fine leg for a single
full and outside off stump, driven to extra cover
leans across to push a length delivery to the off side
from wide of the crease ,a really full delivery on the middle, trying to trap him lbw but Sangakkara takes care not to get his front leg across and on drives to mid-on
beaten outside off stump. The seam was facing the first slip as it came across, landed and shaped away with a scrambled seam and Jayasuriya pushed inside the line
back of length and pushed to backward point
in the channel outside off stump and Jayasuriya covers the off stump and shoulders arms

lands on the length around the leg stump, comes in a touch to hit the pad in front of middle and leg. Shout for lbw but it might have pitched just outside leg and could be going over the stumps. Too much doubt.
leans forward to defend the length delivery to covers
lands on a length just outside the off stump and straightens, left alone.
cracking cover drive to break free of the shackles. Munaf pinged the really full length and Sangakkara creamed it through covers

Another failure for Sangakkara. He tried to force a length delivery outside off through covers but edged it to his leg stump. Kohli had fallen similarly earlier in the day. Munaf has been rewarded for some probing bowling. Sanga then suggests he should have let that one go through to the keeper.
homing in on the off stump and Jayasuriya goes forward, bat and pad close together to defend to covers
just outside the off stump, full in length, pushed to covers
short in length outside off stump, jabbed to backward point
one-handed slice over cover point.It was full and outside off, Jayasuriya went for the square drive , the bottom-hand came of the handle but he got enough elevation
slightly short in length, punched to cover point
back of length, slipping towards the pads, Jayasuriya attempted his short-arm pull but didn't connect and the ball rolled off the pad to the on side
overpitched outside off stump, eased to covers
short of length, cutting away with bounce and Mahela leans forward to defend close to the body
straighter, on the off and middle line, full in length, Mahela pushes it to the on side.

teasing line outside off stump, curving away a touch, Mahela gets close to the line, opens the bat face and guides to cover point where the ball spins away from Kohli who is unable to adjust to the leg break.
bangs it short in length and on the leg stump line, Jayasuriya connects with this short-arm pull to fine-leg boundary
shifts his line to outside off and pushed down the track
full in length, on the middle, moving towards off stump and Mahela does well to get as close to the line of the ball, bat and pad close together to defend to the off side
cutting away from Mahela who is sure of his off stump and shoulders arms
fuller in length, closer to the off and middle line, driven to mid-off
full pitched on the middle and leg line, on driven to mid-on
lands just outside leg stump on a length, moves in to beat the waft and strikes the pad.

more trouble for Mahela. This one lands on the leg stump line, straightens with bounce to beat the defensive stroke and strikes him high on the pad. Mahela lost balance, trying to defend and lunged forward too much. Very good spell from Zak
134.7 kmph length delivery just outside the off stump, on a length and pushed back to the bowler

Jayasuriya continues to fight. Munaf had banged it short and on the leg stump line, trying to surprise Jayasuriya but the marauder pulled it high and over deep backward square leg region. What is his age again?!
stands tall to punch a short-of-length delivery just outside off stump to covers where a diving half-stop is made
coming in towards the off stump and Mahela leans forward to defend
on the middle and leg, clipped to long leg
straightens off a length around the off stump, defended to the off side.
short in length, just outside off stump, tapped close towards covers ,wants a run but changes mind
short in length and coming in from outside off stump, defended down the track
leans forward to defend a back-of-length delivery to the off side
a touch slower, holding its line outside off stump, run down to Munaf at third man
And Jayasuriya is on the attack. He charged down the track, making room outside leg in the process and knifed through the line of a the short-of-length delivery and straight back over the bowler
slower one, around 110 kmph short--of-length delivery and that length allows Jayasuriya to check his pull shot and sort of lap it around the corner to long leg
Wallop! What a cracker. Short in length and outside off stump, Jayasuriya swivelled to pull it over wide midwicket . Fifty for Jayasuriya and Sri Lanka are only 65
fuller, outside off stump, Jayasuriya went hard at the cover drive, too hard and mistimed it to covers
It is official now. Jayasuriya is on the warpath. Stunning pull. Again short of length and outside off and he went back to pull it to deep wide midwicket boundary.
shuffles across, goes hard at the length delivery outside off but bottom edges it to the off side
length delivery around the off stump, defended to the on side of the pitch
fuller, on the middle stump line, pushed to right of mid-on for a single
turning towards middle and leg, worked to Kohli at long leg
sharp turn there. It landed around off and spun away with bounce, left alone and Dhoni gathers

Sharp catch by Raina at first slip and silence envelops the arena. Well-flighted off break around middle, full, Jayasuriya, who must have seen the sharp turn in the previous ball, some how decided to go across the line, trying to tap a single, gets the leading edge and Raina lunges to his left to take a sharp one-handed catch. Super innings comes to an end. He took his time, settled down before cutting loose. Just when Dhoni would have got worried, he falls, though.
big turn again, turns past the waft and runs of the pad
works with the spin to backward square leg for a single
quicker, flatter, shorter and punched through wide midwicket region
a touch short in length, outside off stump, cut to right of Praveen Kumar at third man

loud shout for lbw but turned down. It landed on the off stump on a length, moved past the defensive stroke and hit him on the pad in front of middle and leg. It might have been going down the leg side. Virtual eye suggest it would have  clipped the leg stump
fuller, driven crisply but straight to covers
shaping away from the off stump, steered to left of backward point. Rohit with the direct hit at the striker's end and they take the extra run. It was refered upstairs but the batsman was well home
outside off stump, guided to Rohit
fullish, outside off stump, mistimes the drive to covers
turns in from short of length, clipped to long leg
flighted outside off stump, Mahela gets his front pad outside off, misses the flick and is struck on the pad
beaten in the flight and turn. Mahela went for the on drive , missed and is struck on the pad but outside off stump
big turn from the stumps past Mahela, past Dhoni.
again flighted outside off, sharp turn in, stretches across to defend and is struck on the pad. lbw shout but point of impact was outside off and he was playing a shot
fuller, whipped to short midwicket where Badrinath makes a diving stop
another shout for lbw but again the point of impact was outside off stump and he was trying to defend.
shout for lbw as a floater comes in with the arm, lands on the middle stump line and slides down. It was going down leg side
a touch short, outside off, cut to covers
on the middle stump line, squeezed to backward square leg
short in length, outside off stump, punched to sweeper cover
slower, full and outside off, inviting the drive and Mahela obliges but keeps it along the ground to covers
short in length, backs away to cut but the ball stops on this dry track and he adjusts to jab it to backward point.
flighted on the middle, swept to long leg for a single
flighted outside off, worked past backward short leg and to long leg
comes down the track to work a flighted off break past square leg
stretches across to take the flighted delivery on the pad outside off stump
sharp turn, squeezed to backward square leg
goes back to defend
coming in with the arm, from round the stumps, defended to the off side
short and slow, Kapu went back, picked his spot - the wide midwicket and pinged it with a pull shot
comes down the track to drive a fuller delivery to long-off for a single
short in length, again in with the arm outside off, Mahela goes back to punch to sweeper cover. 100 up for SL.
slightly short in length, pulled to the vacant midwicket region for a single
fuller, outside off stump and Mahela goes for the cut and squeezes it past the slip to third man region
full and on the middle, eased to long-on for a single
flatter, quicker, fuller, outside off, whipped to deep square leg region
flighted full outside off stump, driven to covers
slower, flighted off break outside off stump, Kapugedera waits before working it past square leg
turning big from outside off stump, worked to short fine leg

Suicidal single and Mahela the big fish is gone. It was again turned to short fine leg and this time they decided to go for the single. Mahela was on the back foot when he played that shot and  Kohli's throw came in one bounce to Harbhajan who broke the stumps. Mahela was far away. 106 for 4 and stuttering now.
outside off stump, stays there, left alone
leans forward to drive through covers
Even Yuvraj is getting big turn! This one spun away from the middle stump, past the outside edge
Edged but there is no slip. Again big turn. And Yuvraj is seething. He kicks the ground with his boot.  Now a slip appears.
leans forward to push to the off side
steered to right of backward point where its misfielded by PK
skips down the track and flicks the ball in the air past the short midwicket fielder
lands outside off stump, spins in to take the edge and on to the pad before rolling to the on side
fuller, on the middle, turned past square leg
slower on the middle, worked to square leg
outside the off stump, late cut away through backward point
drags this one short and flat and Dilshan pulls it high over midwicket
around the off stump, turning away, worked to vacant spaces on the on side and Yuvraj singh rushes to midwicket to stop the ball
slower, lands outside off stump and spins away with bounce, Dilshan pulls out of the cut shot and looks at the umpires, suggesting it was a wide.
fuller, on the middle, worked to midwicket for a single
turning away from a length, slow, dabbed to backward point
floated full on the middle, driven to long-off for a single
around the off stump, turned to Praveen Kumar at backward point
quick on middle and leg, driven back past a diving bowler
on middle and leg, drifting down, tucked to square leg
on the stumps, he comes forward works it past midwicket
a touch too short and he gets back to run that past backward point
sharp turn and bounce, spitting away and the batsman leaves it for Dhoni, who has to really watch the ball and does well to collect
quicker, fuller, and he drives it to extra cover, who dives to stop
oh how did that miss? This one stays very, very low and somehow skims past Dilshan's bat and misses the stumps ... Yuvraj cannot believe it, down on his haunches
short, sliding down leg, Dilshan gets back and tries to pull but cannot connect, they appeal but it was clearly going to miss leg stump
too short and he hammers it past midwicket for one
tossed up on the stumps and he defends it back the track
wrong line, sliding down, Dilshan tucks it off the pads and sprints hard

risky single there, a tip-and-run to backward point, some hesitancy, Dilshan wants one and they set off in a mad dash, and the fielder can only run in and not collect cleanly, had he done that it would have been tight

Another one goes. The quicker one, slid in to middle and leg, he shuffled and was rapped on the flap of the pad. umpire took his time ... long thought ... bhajji and all really turned on the heat and given out finally.
flighted full, defended to the off side. Two slips in
leans forward to drive to long off
low full toss on the middle, eased to long-on for a single
full and on the off stump line, driven to long-off for a single
there is a slip in place for Vaas, none for Kapugedera and Vaasy cuts to backward point
slower, outside off stump, edged to backward square leg
short in length outside off, cut to covers
quicker, flatter and shorter , pulled to long-on for a single
well outside the off stump, goes for the square drive misses and big turn
leans across to defend
sweeps to deep square leg region
beaten outside off stump by the sharp turn. Two slips waiting eagerly
really full delivery on the off, driven to covers
slower, leans forward to push it back down the track
driven to long-off for a single
picks the flighted delivery from outside off and swings to long on
Given out lbw; there was a thick inside nick.  It skidded in with the arm, Kapugedera shaped to defend and got a thick inside edge on to the pad in front of middle.
outside off stump, holding its line, pushed to the off side
flighted full on the off stump line, tries to drive across the line, leading edge flass short of covers
full and on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
worked to wide midwicket region for couple of runs
flighted outside off, driven to long-off
leans forward to drive to long-on
quicker, full on the off, jabbed to covers
slower, full and outside off, driven to long-off for a single
turning in from outside off, worked to midwicket
shout for lbw as the ball turns in towards middle and leg, squeezed behind square leg
floated full outside off, driven to long-off for a single
stays back to punch to covers
leans forward to push to covers
short in length, stops on the batsman and Kulasekara checks his cut shot
Vaas pulls out his sweep shot and finds the boundary
skips down the track to turn the flighted delivery behind square leg
leans forward to push to covers
quicker but short in length and Vaas pulls to right of Gambhir at deep midwicket
leans forward to push to covers
floated outside off stump, driven to covers
sweeps to Gambhir at deep midwicket
short and quick outside off, Vaas can't connect with his cut shot
trapped in front. No doubt about this one! It landed around off stump, full, turned in, Vaas tried to play across the line, missed and was struck in front.
turning in from outside off stump, steered to cover point
slightly short in length, outside off, cut to deep backward point
turning in from the off stump line, pushed through covers
flighted on the middle, swept to long leg
flighted from round the stumps, driven to PK at long-off.
on the middle stump line, nudged past square leg
full and outside off stump, jabbed to the on side
beaten by the big-spinning delivery from the middle stump line
on the middle stump line, turned to fine leg
Thushara decides enough is enough with this poking around and goes for the slog sweep on a bent knee. High up and over wide midwicket boundary
full and outside off stump, quick, Thushara goes for the drive but can't connect
waist-high full toss and Thushara swings it over deep square leg region. Crowd love it.
shorter in length, flatter, gets a bottom edge to the ground on the attempted cut shot
turning in from outside off stump, past the prod and off the pad to the leg side
slower, outside off, comes down the track to drive to covers
a tad quicker, on the off stump, pushed to short mid-on region
gets forward to drive to covers
around the off stump, fuller, turned to short midwicket region where Yuvraj Singh is stationed
turns in, again worked to short midwicket
skies the intended lofted shot across the line right in between long-off and the cover fielder running back
pretty full in length, stabbed to Yuvraj at covers
another full delivery but width offered this time and sliced to left of sweeper cover
full and straight, driven to long-off for a single
cutting in towards the off stump, pushed to covers
lovely pick up shot to midwicket boundary. It was the attempted yorker, ended up as a low full toss and he whipped it up and over midwicket
turns in from outside off, gets pas the attempted waft and Dhoni gathers down leg side. They appeal for a catch and the umpire signals wide.
stumped by the doosra. The batsman was well down the track, had no clue as the ball left him and was stranded. India edge towards the series win
leans forward to defend close on the off side and Harbhajan picks up the ball
beaten by the doosra but there is no slip. He had lunged forward to drive, sucked by the doosra, and the ball clipped Dhoni's gloves and ran through the vacant cordon.
shout for the lbw as the ball turns in to beat the defensive prod and strikes him high on the pad
ANother doosra,  the batsman is beaten and it bounds off the body through vacant slip cordon
short in length, goes for the pull, misses and is struck high on the pad
low full toss down the leg side and Thushara swings it past the short fine-leg fielder
Dropped by Zaheer. Thushara cleared the front foot and went for the pull but flat batted it to Zaheer who clangs it
full and slower, steered to backward point.
almost a yorker, dug out to short midwicket
charges down the track, moves outside leg and has a big slash and a miss to a back-of-length delivery outside off stump
flighted around leg stump, no shot offered and the ball hits the bat handle and drops down in front of him
leans forward to drive to long-off
on the off stump line, jabbed to the off side
short in length, turning on the middle and leg line, turned past square leg
flighted outside leg stump, swept to left of short fine leg where Yuvraj makes a diving stop
pushes it through quicker and slips it down leg side

turning in from outside off, not sure whether there was a inside edge but it bounded off the pad and just short of the diving first slip. Harbhajan was getting interested before he holds his head. a very good spell from him. He took the main man - Jayasuriya to put India on top
goes for the yorker, on the leg stump line, off the pad to Dhoni
low dipping full toss on the off stump, mistimes the swat to the mid-off region

Mendis is run out. It was pushed to backward point and didn't set off for the single. Thushara had rushed across and Mendis, late in responding, was never going to get to the other side to beat the throw to Zaheer  from Rohit Sharma. India just a wicket away now.
a very good yorker on the middle and leg line, dug out to mid-on region
edged but falls short of the diving Dhoni. Zaheer is operating from round the stumps
short in length and whizzing past the off stump, Murali tries to dab it to the off side and is beaten
full and outside off, driven to long-off. That brings Murali on strike.
on the middle and leg line, misses the swing but will pick up a leg bye
full and outside off, slower, goes for the big drive, bottom edges to left of Dhoni. After some hesitation they go for the single and Dhoni's throw was wide
leans forward to drive to Yuvraj at covers
low full toss, swatted to Zaheer at midwicket
another low full toss, just outside off stump, beats the swing across the line and Dhoni collects
backs outside leg stump and tries to biff the full delivery through covers but edges it to fine leg
full toss on the off stump line, pushed to deep cover

And India have won the series. First time they have beaten Sri Lanka in a bilateral series of ODIs in Sri Lanka. Thushara swung the full delivery straight to Raina at deep midwicket. The players get into a huddle of joy. Beyond the boundary, the chairman of selectors Vengsarkar shakes hands with Gary Kirsten.
